= Introduction =

This manual is for implementing LDAP-based LAN, based on CentOS 5.3.

== Objects: ==

 * users
 * hosts
 * resources

== Structure: ==

 * packages
 * deps
 * configs and data
 * installation
 * setting up
 * check
 * deleting
 * controlling of objects:
  * add
  * delete
  * change
 * backup/restore
  * configs
  * data
 * migration (to another host)
  * network
  * server name
  * domain
